p: Secondary effects of ROS generation include depigmentation of cotyledons in A. thaliana by Heterothalamus psiadioides EOs. The effects are here observed in a dose-dependent manner and in very small amounts. The authors also suggest that alteration on auxin levels occur as a secondary effect. Exogenous addition of antioxidants did not reverse effects on adventitious rooting, indicating that damages were too severe [ 48].
